name: headwind
title: headwind
description: Converts a natural language prompt to a styled react component to be inserted in a code editor
author: austinjxseph

commands.name: create-component
commands.title: Create Component
commands.description: Cretes a React Component from styles specified in a prompt

tools.name: add-style
tools.title: Add style
tools.description: Adds a style parameter to a selected component from the library

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
